page.title: 15Origins Of Families
page.content: We have carried out a survey amongst the parents of the pupils at Stanhope Barrington School.In this survey we hoped to find out information that would tell us where these families live and have lived. Question:How long have you lived in Stanhope? Just over a half of the people said that they have lived in Stanhope for over twenty years,over one third have lived here for 10-20 years,and only one fifth for less than five years. Question:Where did you attend Primary school? Over one third of our children's parents went to Primary school in Stanhope.Another third went to Primary school elsewhere in Weardale or Co.Durham. Many of our families have lived here for a long time.
